title: Unveiling the multifaceted incorporation of Musa acuminata peduncle juice as a bio-corrosion inhibitor of mild steel in seawater-simulated solution
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10662-10671
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00826J, Paper

This work assessed the ability of Musa acuminata peduncle juice extract to sustainably inhibit mild steel under salinized conditions.
